items.label: 577447845457a3bc71ff4c81
items.name: Residential Service Single Phase (RS-37C)
items.description:
APPLICABLE: 
For residential electric service to private residences, individual family apartments, or farms with individual motor loads not larger than 10 horsepower, supplied through one meter. 

Service is for the use of the customer and may not otherwise be shared and may not be resold to others. 

When a portion of a residence is used for other than residential purposes the appropriate non-residential service schedule will be applied. 

Not applicable to standby or supplementary service.
items.energycomments: Adjustments = Storm Damage Rate schedule + Middle South Energy Rider schedule + Power Management Rider adjustment + Unit Power Cost Recovery Rider adjustment + Energy Efficiency Cost Recovery Rider adjustment + Energy Cost Recovery adjustment + System Restoration Charge Rider adjustment + MISO Cost & Revenue Rider adjustment
